class BlazeBlock[source]

BlazeBlock(in_channels, out_channels, kernel_size=5, stride=1, use_res_conv=False) :: Module

Based on https://github.com/hollance/BlazeFace-PyTorch/blob/master/blazeface.py

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import torch

x = torch.randn(1, 8, 10, 10)
block = BlazeBlock(8, 16, kernel_size=5, stride=2)
block(x).shape

torch.Size([1, 16, 5, 5])
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class BlazeFaceBlock[source]

BlazeFaceBlock(in_channels, out_channels, kernel_size=3, stride=1) :: BlazeBlock

Basic Block for BlazeFace Model

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
x = torch.randn(1, 8, 10, 10)
block = BlazeFaceBlock(8, 16, stride=2)
assert tuple(block(x).shape) == (1, 16, 5, 5)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
x = torch.randn(1, 8, 10, 10)
block = BlazeFaceBlock(8, 16, stride=1)
assert tuple(block(x).shape) == (1, 16, 10, 10)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class BlazePoseBlock[source]

BlazePoseBlock(in_channels, out_channels, kernel_size=5, stride=1) :: BlazeBlock

Basic Block for BlazePose Model

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
x = torch.randn(1, 8, 10, 10)
block = BlazePoseBlock(8, 16, stride=1)
assert tuple(block(x).shape) == (1, 16, 10, 10)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
x = torch.randn(1, 8, 10, 10)
block = BlazePoseBlock(8, 16, stride=2)
assert tuple(block(x).shape) == (1, 16, 5, 5)
{% endraw %}
